title: can it get me banned
body: im sure it wouldnt get me banned on CS but im not too sure about valorant as it can be considered as cheating, did you try it on something other than CS
author: Ayush-Mann-0

comments.body: I tried it on Valorant for a while (2 competitive matches) and nothing happened so I guess it's fine.

satisfaction_conditions: Evidence that the tool does not trigger anti-cheat detection in Valorant
Information about usage in competitive multiplayer games beyond CS:GO
